classData.comment:
/**
 * A singleton manager to track the currently running effect.
 * This allows reactive properties to know which effect to subscribe to.
 * @class Neo.core.EffectManager
 * @singleton
 */
classData.description: A singleton manager to track the currently running effect. This allows reactive properties to know which effect to subscribe to.
classData.name: EffectManager

classData.comment:
/**
     * Adds a `Neo.core.Config` instance as a dependency for the currently active effect.
     * This method checks if the EffectManager is paused before adding the dependency.
     * @param {Neo.core.Config} config The config instance to add as a dependency.
     */
classData.description: Adds a Neo.core.Config instance as a dependency for the currently active effect. This method checks if the EffectManager is paused before adding the dependency.

params.description: The config instance to add as a dependency.
params.name: config

classData.name: addDependency

classData.description: Returns the effect currently at the top of the stack (i.e., the one currently running).
classData.name: getActiveEffect

classData.description: Pauses dependency tracking for effects. While paused, calls to addDependency will be ignored.
classData.name: pause

classData.description: Pops the current effect from the stack, returning to the previous effect (if any).
classData.name: pop

classData.comment:
/**
     * Pushes an effect onto the stack, marking it as the currently running effect.
     * @param {Neo.core.Effect} effect The effect to push.
     */
classData.description: Pushes an effect onto the stack, marking it as the currently running effect.
classData.name: push
